name: Marvin's Garden
description:
Help stop the weed infestation in Marvin's Garden! In this arcade style rhythm-based game, you move to the beat while pulling weeds and avoiding dangerous pests.  How long can you last the growing infestation?

Controls:

Arrow keys: Move

Z (O button) + Arrow keys: Spray weapon

Credits:

Created using Pico-8

Design, art, music: David Stephen

Cover art: Craig Stephen

Enemy sprites inspired by @kirai_s.

Special thanks to the Pico-8 community, and tutorial creators including @LazyDevsAcademy and @bridgs_dev.
